segments.text: The two children are a perfect little team, I notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is doing the risky part, reaching for the cookies up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is acting as a lookout, or perhaps just a very eager recipient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is open, clearly signaling her readiness to catch a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's impressive how quietly they are executing their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really don't want to alert the woman to their delicious heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boyâ€™s grip on the plate, either as a lid or a catcher, is quite ingenious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the excitement building as he grabs the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a moment of pure, unadulterated childhood joy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risk of the stool tipping doesn't seem to deter their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely focused on their sugary prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile to see such determined little conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what childhood memories are made of, secret cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
